questions.question: What is a data structure?
options: A way to organize and store data

questions.question: Which of the following is a linear data structure?
What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array by index?
Which data structure follows LIFO (Last In First Out) principle?
What is the time complexity of inserting an element at the end of a dynamic array?
Which of the following is a non-linear data structure?
What is the worst-case time complexity of quicksort?
Which algorithm is used to find the shortest path in a weighted graph?
What is the space complexity of a linked list?
Which sorting algorithm has the best average case time complexity?
What is a binary search tree?
options: A tree where each node has at most two children and left < right
A tree with exactly two children per node

questions.question: Which data structure is used for implementing recursion?
What is the time complexity of binary search?
Which of the following is used to implement priority queues?
What is dynamic programming?
options: A method to solve complex problems by breaking them into simpler subproblems

questions.question: Which algorithm is used to find minimum spanning tree?
What is the time complexity of inserting an element into a hash table?
Which traversal visits the root node first in a tree?
What is a graph in data structures?
options: A collection of nodes connected by edges

questions.question: Which algorithm is used to detect cycles in a graph?
